title: Aria - As If Forever Really Exists [North Carolina Metalcore] [2
description:
"As If Forever Really Exists" is a bold and undeniably metal infused hardcore statement. Blast beats, chugga chugga breakdowns, guitar harmonies that would make any In Flames fan overtly excited, and Paul Genet&#039;s distinct vocal styling all help to push "As If Forever Really Exists" beyond the status of "another metalcore release." In fact, with the release of this MCD, ARIA are surely going to turn heads, and push themselves into the forefront of today&#039;s hardcore scene. ARIA are recommended if you would enjoy a mix of In Flames and Hatebreed. Check out tracks such as "This Night Has Opened My Eyes, And I Will Never Sleep Again," "A Gift Of Dead Flowers For My Dying Beauty" and "My Genesis, My Judas" to grasp the brightest moments ARIA have to offer.

Tracklist :

1. Prelude
2. this night has opened my eyes and i will never sleep again
3. my genesis, my judas
4. The natural evolution toward tragedy and dissolution
5. A gift of dead flowers, for my dying beauty
6. Crippled by the weight of another day
7. As if forever really exists
8. Tragedie



192kbps, 44100 Hz Stereo MP3
